snippet: Marvin Hamlisch, who won Emmy, Grammy, Tony and Academy Awards as well as the Pulitzer Prize, will be remembered at public visitations in New York on Sunday and Monday, and at a funeral service on Tuesday.
abstract: Marvin Hamlisch, who won Emmy, Grammy, Tony and Academy Awards as well as the Pulitzer Prize, will be remembered at public visitations in New York on Sunday and Monday, and at a funeral service on Tuesday.

headline.main: Funeral Services Planned for Marvin Hamlisch
headline.print_headline: Funeral Services Set for Marvin Hamlisch
